price: Na ba bandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza; abo ni abantu bo mu ijuru, bazaribamo ubuziraherezo.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
